title: OPL Feb 5th tipping results!
body:
Only **42** summoners managed to pick all 4 winners correctly last night. If you're one of the few that picked them all tonight make sure you have also made your picks for Monday night! You can find all the details here: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/esports/3tuEWsyB-oceanic-pro-league-round-1-tipping-who-are-you-backing

**Biggest upset**
Only 38% of tippers picked Sudden Fear to beat 4Not on Thursday night.

**Full tipping results for Feb 5th**
http://i.imgur.com/FzUfu2m.png

replies.body: When I was at board home page I thought this thread was meant to be about Pac-man, because well, the pic.
That 92 to 8 Chiefs vs Sudden Fear.
